duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement DNS systems and structures to support enterprise DNS and TLD infrastructure
Lead technical resources in providing project outcomes
Support all DNS Engineering infrastructures including DNS, DNSSEC, Puppet, Anisble, Software and OS testing, daily maintenance and troubleshooting
Maintain and troubleshoot servers and infrastructure, keeping them up to date
Address daily email issues and manage a daily checklist
Manage project work and keep software and systems up to date

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
